Engineered stone: Doctors urge ban on benchtop material, warn tradies of risk from silicosis lung disease https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/engineered-stone-doctors-urge-ban-on-benchtop-material-warn-tradies-risk-silicosis-lung-disease/XR24DQQVQFE3ZOPPB36RI7R7RQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/engineered-stone-doctors-urge-ban-on-benchtop-material-warn-tradies-risk-silicosis-lung-disease/XR24DQQVQFE3ZOPPB36RI7R7RQ/ The College of Physicians has written to the PM, saying lives are at risk. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Dr Alexandra Muthu is an expert on a lung related diseases such as silicosis. The Royal Australasian College of Physicians (RACP) has written to the government asking for a ban or greater restrictions on engineered stone, an artificial bench top used in most new kitchens. Photo / Jason Oxenham

Fewer Aucklanders heading to Northland to view real estate during Brynderwyns closure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/fewer-aucklanders-heading-to-northland-to-view-real-estate-during-brynderwyns-closure/FB7RBUJKOZE3FKQ46R34VI23IM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/fewer-aucklanders-heading-to-northland-to-view-real-estate-during-brynderwyns-closure/FB7RBUJKOZE3FKQ46R34VI23IM/ Jenny LingBrynderwyns closure gives locals advantage: 'They don’t have to compete with Aucklanders'. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Ray White Bream Bay and Waipu real estate agent James Alexander said many Aucklanders won’t bother making the trip north as the detour routes through Waipu Cove and Paparoa-Oakleigh Rd will add more time to their journeys.
